targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{prometheus="$environment", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$deployment-.*", resource="cpu", unit="core", container!=""}) by (pod)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{prometheus="$environment", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$deployment-.*", resource="cpu", unit="core", container!="POD", container!=""}) by (pod)
